review: It was easy to install and start using right way. It is everything I thought it was plus.
author: Robert ruiz

review: Overall the Fire TV Stick has worked well with the exception of the Plex app.  Within 2 minutes of playing a video, the app stops and asks for you to become a Plex subscriber or pay a 1-time $5 fee.  I thought that the fee was exorbitant since I had already paid for the Plex app, but I begrudgingly paid the $5 fee.  This allowed me to watch my own video, but shortly thereafter, the Plex app asked me to pay the fee again.  Until this glitch gets resolved, the Fire TV stick has not met my expectations.
author: Matt

review: I really like the Fire Stick.  We have 2 Chromecasts and 2 Fire Sticks.  What I like about the Fire Stick is the remote.  I only give it a 3 because we purchased the Sling TV to view live tv and have had many issues with it.
author: Amazon Customer

review: I am currently working in Trinidad & bought this to take with me. It was easy to set up & works wonderfully - I would certainly recommend it especially for thhe price
author: Lynne Ross-Palmer

review: Is really spectacular, I love it

review: Totally enjoy the Fire TV Stick!!!
